Changelog:
Build 2024.3.9.744
- Implemented Localisation (Keybinds only until full translation)
- Added support for Chinese characters
- Added Translate and TranslateTo to AddonAPI
- Added Addon Version back to overview rather than tooltip
- Added WndProcSendToGame to AddonAPI
- Added option to always show Quick Access (New default is hidden in Character Select / Loading)

Build 2024.3.5.1353
- Fixed Uninstall button not showing when addon not loaded.
- Added Addon Labels for Options & Quick Access Simple Shortcuts
- Added log message with channel for API Revision 2. (Unreleased.)
- Added ctags to log message to colour specific parts. Example usage <c=#FF0000>This text would be red.</c>
- Fixed rare case where addons that are empty would try to load.
 Fixed addons with EUpdateProvider::Direct sometimes updating even though the disk version was newer than remote.
- Added logic to ensure the load order of the ArcDPS integration is always the same. GetAddonDef(arcdps) -> GetAddonDef(integration) -> Addon::Load(integration) -> Addon::Load(arcdps) -> arcdps::addextension2(integration)
- Added option to only load specific addons via start parameter. Example usage -ggaddons "17, -1" will only load addons with signature 17 and -1 if they exist.
- Moved Addon Version from item to tooltip.
- Added option to queue locked addons to disable for next game start.
- Fixed keybind setter not working.
- Fixed individual keybinds not working, breaking all.
- Moved actions from addon item.
- Added option to pause updates for individual addons.
- Added option to manually update for individual addons.
- Added refresh button to Addons window to manually invoke the loader in case addons don't get picked up automatically.
- Added GetOrCreate functions to TextureLoader in API Revision 2. (Unreleased.)
- Added addon disabler, to automatically disable volatile addons when the game updates.
- Added remembering of addon state (Loaded/Not Loaded) for next game start.

Build 2024.2.22.1256
- now raising MumbleIdentity change event when an addon gets loaded to supply info to it
- Nexus events are now synchronous
- added RaiseNotification for backwards compatibility identical to Raise(nullptr) (API Revision 2, unreleased.)
- added EV_ADDON_LOADED when an addon gets loaded, payload is addon signature (signed int)
- added EV_ADDON_UNLOADED when an addon gets unloaded, payload is addon signature (signed int)
- link to arcdps style now also factors in the font and font size
- added option to save/load custom styles like arcdps does, format should be identical
- fixed a race condition on shutdown
- implemented arcdps integration
- EV_ARCDPS_COMBATEVENT_LOCAL_RAW and EV_ARCDPS_COMBATEVENT_SQUAD_RAW can be used now
- fixed some addons not getting loaded when copy pasted/moved into addon dir (maybe)
- minor UI tweaks
- added uninstall button for locked addons (won't take effect until restart)
- added checkbox to show already installed addons in library
- added check for updates button

Build 2024.2.14.1220
- Fixed update notification icon.
- Fixed API caching issue.
- Removed some excessive debug log messages.

Build 2024.2.13.1386
- Fixed very rare shutdown crashes.
- Added some debug information.
- Fixed window flickering (random keybind invocation) with certain BlishHUD plugins.
- Fixed a deadlock-type scenario on Linux regarding loading textures.
- Fixed some wrong style colours in the Addons window.

Build 2024.2.12.1412
- Moved addon installation into separate thread, blocking additional calls.

Build 2024.2.12.1283
- No longer freeing DirectX library, let system handle it.
- Removed Dev Mode from options, edit via start parameter or config.
- Implemented Multiboxer/Mutexkiller
- Performance improvements across the board.
- Fixes across the board.
- Added error handling for config files.
- Added EUpdateProvider::Direct for non GitHub/Raidcore hosted addons.
- Reworked Loader addon loading detection. No longer delayed to load addons.
- Added seasonal Nexus icons.
- Added Nexus Update Notifcations setting and changelog.
- Added NotifyShortcut to Revision 2 (Unreleased.)
- Fix some window keybinds.
- Major internal reworks.
- Added linking to ArcDPS style. Custom styles won't be saved.
- Added icons to menu items.
- Added APIClient, later to be added to Revision 2 of AddonAPI.
- Stylised Addons window.
- Fixed Keybinds getting deleted entirely on deregister.
- Adjusted Mumble polling rate to 50ms.
- Fixed addon updates.
- Adjusted multiline text on smallest UI setting looking wonky due to floating point calculations.
- Removed config file saving on shutdown.
- Addon updates no longer download releases/latest but the top result from releases for GitHub hosted addons.
- Added addon library.
